text: Lepidotrigla kishinouyi is a species of fish in the sea robin family It can be found from southern Japan to the East China Sea. It inhabits sandy mud bottoms. It lives at a depth of 40 m to 140 m. It grows to a length of 20 cm. == References == ==External links== * Category:Triglidae Category:Fish described in 1911
title: Lepidotrigla kishinouyi
